body:
Hi Jill,


I inquired about this to the Diva folks and they said that the recently released DAYSIM-PS does.  That version is not yet bundled into Diva and  I have not checked into it further at this point.


That's all I know but hopefully we will get some more responses here with encouraging news!


Regards,


Sandy Houck   LEED AP BD+C, LC
Brummitt Energy Associates, Inc.
619-531-1126
